    • Method Detail

      • getInit

        public static void getInit(java.lang.String networkId,
           java.lang.String siteId,
           java.lang.String articleId,
           com.loopj.android.http.JsonHttpResponseHandler handler)
                    throws java.io.UnsupportedEncodingException
        Performs a network request on a different thread and delivers a message to the callback. A JSON object with the results will be bound to the message.
        Parameters:
        networkId - The collection's network as identified by domain, i.e. livefyre.com.
        siteId - The Id of the article's site.
        articleId - The Id of the collection's article.
        handler - Response handler
        Throws:
        java.io.UnsupportedEncodingException
        java.net.MalformedURLException

      • generateInitEndpoint

        public static java.lang.String generateInitEndpoint(java.lang.String networkId,
                                    java.lang.String siteId,
                                    java.lang.String articleId)
                                             throws java.io.UnsupportedEncodingException
        Generates an init endpoint with the specified parameters.
        Parameters:
        networkId - The collection's network as identified by domain, i.e. livefyre.com.
        siteId - The Id of the article's site.
        articleId - The Id of the collection's article.
        Returns:
        The init endpoint with the specified parameters.
        Throws:
        java.io.UnsupportedEncodingException
        java.net.MalformedURLException
